diseaseDescription: Caused by Fusarium oxysporum, this disease invades roots or rhizomes, leading to vascular blockage, purplish discoloration, wilting leaves, and eventual plant death in humid, warm conditions.

chemicalControl.title: Systemic Fungicides
steps: Remove diseased tissue cutting into healthy tissue
Apply systemic fungicide labeled for Fusarium
Drench the root zone and pans with fungicide

ecoFriendly.title: None Effective
steps: No reliable eco-friendly treatments available; strict hygiene and prevention are best
